name: Shortcut
description:
A  tasty 3-2-1 Berries&Cream what is every time again in my rotation.
3% Forest Fruit sounds much, but the OBa Oba tunes it down.

+ Taste is diffrent. İf you like the fruit not so strong, start with 2% or 2.5% of Forest Fruit.
+ İf you have no FA Oba Oba in your stash, you can sub it with FA Marshmallow.
 
Its good after a good shake, but gets better after day 3!

Sweeten for taste.
author: Zugmaschine
